thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.com.au
thread.title: Lauren W.

author: Lauren W.
title: Lauren W.
text: Allister was extremely helpful from the get go and made the process so much easier, I got the exact product I was looking for and the quality of Flashbay's products are second to none! I received assistance throughout the whole process, and Allister provided me with multiple Proofs of my desired product to ensure I got exactly what I was after. I would absolutely recommend Flashbay and Allister in particular to all of my colleges and other professionals!
